title: Side Chair, "Sandows No. 5", 1929
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Esme Usdan and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Side chair consisting of tubular chromed metal frame, the back and seat with 30 horizontal ivory-colored elasticized bands attached to frame with metal wire hooks.  Second generation (from original source).

exhibitions.title: Looking Forward/ Looking Back: Recent Acquisitions in 20th- and 21st-Century Design

tombstone.epitaph:
Side Chair, "Sandows No. 5", 1929.
1929. Chromium-plated tubular steel, fiber, rubber. Museum purchase through gift of Esme Usdan and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2006-17-1.
